html:
12.5.24  4:59 am   I suspect you havebeen asked more questions than anyone else living on this planet Earth.
What is something poignant you have learned or observed in being asked so many questions?

      there are some very peculiar and specific extremely common ways of phrasing things that i never would have expected

12.5.24  3:32 am   How much commercial success would you be comfortable with

      maybe like mickey mouse, give or take

12.5.24  1:36 am   i'm in nyc and i want to start playing piano in jazz jams but i am not sure how to prepare.

     the best way to prepare to play with others is to play with others. kind of a catch 22, but that's how it goes

     i've done some blues jams but from seeing some jazz jams i get the impression they require better chops & more familiarity with the songs. (or do i need to get really good at sightreading / ear training?) i have been learning a few famous jazz standards but i'm not sure how i'm supposed to fit into the arrangement (when to play melody+chords, just melody, just chords, or a fill or solo). and i am decent at improvising but not sure how to make it sound jazzy. i have good understanding of harmony but usually don't have the skill to use it better than picking the right scales to play in. i'm learning that enclosures are useful for a jazzy sound but beyond that idk. i've heard about the altered scale but when i try it it just sounds off key. and am i supposed to be intuitively making harmonic substitutions? anyway do you have any advice for this situation?

     this would be like if i were to try to describe to you how to speak english. i can't describe it. you've just learned to do it somehow. all of the technical musings you've talked about are things that only make sense to you after you've already learned your way of doing music based on your feelings

12.5.24  1:08 am   if you could change the year, what year would you go back to?

      the basic rules and parameters of this thought exercise are not clear to me

12.5.24  12:14 am   mechanical penicls or regular pencils

      that would be a great game show. you should hurry up before merv griffin thinks of it first

12.5.24  12:04 am   i believe some people are perfect and do things (like academia) perfectly. why can't most people just be perfect and do everything perfectly? why can't i be perfect

      what is this the conflation station

12.4.24  10:48 pm   everywhere i've been it rains. how do i solve this?

      go to some places which have been having severe drought

12.4.24  10:09 pm   i think mm/dd is better because the months contain the days, you know. that would be like telling the time with minutes first instead of hours

      i see what you're saying. putting the year first would make that system complete

12.4.24  8:20 pm   why do we hurt each other ?

      now that i think about it, it's usually either by mistake, or to get someone's attention

12.4.24  5:42 pm   why does it feel like casual hobbies have become so competitive?

      maybe you've been just watching a lot of clickbait

12.4.24  1:23 pm   basically ive had some good lyric / melody ideas for a song about a thing floating in my head, and now i found some also good instrumental ideas for a song about the same thing but these 2 dont work together. do i try making some frankenstein or do i just make 2 different songs about the same thing

      my recommendation is not to force 2 different songs together

12.4.24  11:18 am   what's a good present for my dad?  context: he's slightly shorter than me

      in that context i am forced to suggest a periscope

12.4.24  10:24 am   What's a word with no pratical use that still gets used?

      there is no such thing

12.4.24  10:23 am   how did we discover that planting plants makes them grow

      we probably saw other plants planting plants

12.4.24  10:09 am   what should i do with the art that i can't show to anyone

      show it to everyone

12.4.24  9:13 am   black or white

      is it possible to mix them together

12.4.24  8:52 am   Does the day really go on...:(

      yes it does

12.4.24  6:25 am   would you be able to write a story with the same number of letters as this question?

      yes i could, but this is not it. if these letters match here it's purely a coincidence

12.4.24  6:21 am   was the brief little solo bit near the end of i'm a princess improv'd? (right before "step into the machine") that one might be too powerful, could you maybe just delete it?

      that one was not improvised. but to make up for that, i offer you the one in 'airport terminal' near the end, which was improvised

12.4.24  3:20 am   Do you wish we still wrote in Hieroglyphs? I am still very bitter that the phoenicians dumbed down language & writing.

      you could try chinese, that might be a little more interesting for you

12.4.24  2:22 am   whats you're favarite word

      to

12.4.24  12:54 am   Thoughts on 2025?

      square. haven't had one of those since 1936

12.4.24  12:19 am   what is your opinion on the chords in "long long long journey"? 

      it gets the job done

12.3.24  7:35 pm   i'm so tired of everything. what can i do 

      how about taking a nap

12.3.24  7:03 pm   How do you feel about the contrapuntal harmonic techniques of the 18th century? 

      the name for it surely could never keep up with what you can actually do

12.3.24  6:27 pm   do you think college is necessary to be successful?

      no, it's just a very different kind of success from some of the other kinds

12.3.24  6:07 pm   what's a room that I should build in my underground minecraft base?

      does it not already have a billiard table room

12.3.24  5:12 pm   would you say that your are vacationing in the center of a black hole right now?

      i'm circumnavigating the edges of the playing field

12.3.24  5:06 pm   could self-driving cars decide to run away from their owner and become a self-owning car

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.3.24  4:44 pm   Some of the answers to these questions are absolute gold, what's your secret?

      that's just basic alchemy

12.3.24  4:36 pm   do you ever improv solos or are they always written out?

      some are improvised and some are not. it's usually fairly easy to tell which ones are written because they sound like hooks, or perhaps even playing the same melody that the lyrics sang earlier

12.3.24  1:57 pm   Why are they called hi-hats?

      i thought you named it that

12.3.24  11:49 am   if your favorite supermarket suddenly decided to close and made everything super cheap (5c) for its last couple of hours, what's the first thing that you would pick up 

      how about some of the signs

12.3.24  11:36 am   How well do you memorize your song lyrics... or I guess how long do you remember them. 

      what makes it even harder to remember is when you write them slightly different in each recurring part

12.3.24  10:28 am   opinion on using the word "kindly" to make requests sound more professional?

      it might work

12.3.24  10:24 am   Do triangles dream in 3D, or do they secretly wish they were circles?

      both

12.3.24  10:14 am   From what I can tell, you have some form of perfect pitch.
To what extent do you think this helps you when making/recording/playing music?
For people like me who were not blessed with the gift of perfect pitch, do you think we're at much of a disadvantage compared to people like you who do?
Do you think your musical abilities, and your music itself, would be much different if you didn't have perfect pitch at all?

      if you learn the note names based on absolute pitch in early life, i think that might actually hurt your music. music is all in the relationships between the notes. finding the absolute is just a party trick i learned later in life, which has a limited number of random professional benefits. to compare it to cooking, absolute pitch would be like memorizing the UPC codes of all your ingredients, where as relational pitch would mean you can taste what they actually do. i myself was actually surprised to find out how truly unmusical the absolute pitch is. which is also what makes it so confusing that the phrase 'perfect pitch' is something that sounds like it means your pitch is perfect, but it neither means that nor is musical

12.3.24  9:04 am   how do i describe people beyond listing a bunch of facts?

      maybe you could speculate about what their chess strategy would be

12.3.24  8:38 am   you part of any cults of personality?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.3.24  8:32 am   What's your favourite coin

      the usa nickel (5 cent) standing on its edge

12.3.24  8:13 am   what's a good way to improvise dialogue if i'm the person voiceacting both characters? it's hard to interrupt myself when i'm already the one speaking

      you'll need to tighten it up in editing, but you can basically improvise it while imagining you are briefly pressing pause in your head to switch characters. and then just tighten the gaps in editing

12.3.24  7:15 am   what are some steps to reinventing oneself

      you have to see how you've been and yet how you could be, all at the same time

12.3.24  5:39 am   do you know the hack for better mental health?

      sure. start trying to derive a formula for the area of a regular polygon with n sides and circumference 1

12.3.24  4:57 am   what's your shoe size?

      100

12.3.24  4:08 am   How to not forget how to exist?

      that's easy, just don't remember how to not exist

12.3.24  4:01 am   What's the best color, mathematically speaking?

      grey

12.3.24  1:10 am   how much is improvised when recording for your videos with dialogue?

      maybe .01%, but it's my constant new years resolution to increase this to upwards of 60 or 75%

12.3.24  12:17 am   When did humans sort of become recognizably human? 

      pretty soon

12.2.24  7:24 pm   what is an example of a way to quickly feel less blue on demand

      there is nothing entirely reliable. the good news is, to make up for that it happens by surprise

12.2.24  4:20 pm   Hello! If you have a project that's too big how do you smallify it again?

      sometimes you can just plan on smallifying the next one. you will have something to look forward to while you are teaching yourself just how and why not to do it so big
